Medium: Illustrated book with 2 lithographs; 7 engravings (2 with roulette or rocker); 2 soft ground etchings; and 5 etchings (4 with aquatint or soft ground etching)
Dimensions:
page  10 15/16 x 8 13/16" (27 x 22.4 cm)
Prints: various dimensions.
Artist: Various Artists, Albert (Albert Mentzel) Flocon, Jean Fautrier, Henri Goetz, Roger Chastel, Raoul Ubac, Pierre Courtin, Christine Boumeester, M. Fiorini, Albert E. Yersin, Léon Prébandier, Germaine Richier, Jean Signovert, Roger Vieillard, Jacques Villon, Gérard Vulliamy, Sylvain Durand
Title: À LA GLOIRE DE LA MAIN
